Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_neho9nOrRA1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1GhGUdQ"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e40349d686a49b02eb02c2ceeca81793/tumblr_inline_nehog2yjqT1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><strong>Ven</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1sa9PHe"><strong>STOCK PART REVAMP</strong></a> is a pack that revamps a number of KSP stock textures and models in an effort to make the game a nicer looking place for all. The pack was recently mentioned by <a href="http://bit.ly/1cHJMVK"><strong>/r/kerbalspaceprogram</strong></a> as being the “Best Mod You’ve Never Heard of.” Do you agree with that? Give it a <a href="http://bit.ly/1GhGUdQ"><strong>DOWNLOAD</strong> </a>and try it on for size.</p>

<p></p>
Wooh! So glad to see this featured!
So now it's being implemented in stock, right?

So now it's being implemented in stock, right?

i sure hope so

i sure hope so

Ditto.

10chars.
It's an amazing piece of work, and still going. Shows that realistic can be *very* pretty, and also give more construction options.

Amazing choice! This is the first mod highlight that I've actually used before it was highlighted! Great piece of work. Any chance at all some of these could become stock? I'm a big fan of the new decouplers and parachute textures. Any chance someone on the inside could answer this?
If this doesn't make its way into stock I'll be very angry and express that anger by shaking my fist at the screen. You have been warned.

Dude, those parts are freaken beautiful. I could definitely see some of these textures in stock. Actually, if that happened, then there would probably be "Alpha" and "Beta" legacy packs for the old and older parts.

I think what I like best about this is that it doesn't make the textures crazy different, it still uses the basic texture idea the devs already have for it. Kinda like how spaceplane plus had it's own textures, but stayed in a "kerbal" sense of design.
Squad, hire this man. Hire him now, pay him handsomely and enjoy the glorious texture updates he brings.

I've started to warm up to this mod, gonna try it now*.

*ASAP, I've got stuff to do.

Absolutely beautiful parts. Seriously, I know the "this mod should be stock" line gets thrown about a lot, but this mod is not much different than Spaceplane plus. It's the perfect candidate and it doesn't even change the parts too drastically, just enough. All the parts may not be needed thanks to the SP+ integration, but there are some really good rocket alternative textures.

Edited November 4, 2014 by Alshain

I like how it kind of bring out a more "homogeneous" look to the parts. In the current stock version both models and texture can be all over the place. This brings the "feel" to something which is more continuous look. good work

Sold.

/10char
To be honest, I struggle to tell the difference between these and stock. Anyone got pictures of stock vs revamp side by side?

Really good work! I don't know if it'll make it into stock though: It appears that up till now squad has gone for the 'found in the scrapyard' look to their texturing, as evidenced by the subtle scratches and smears. As lovely as this is, it may go against that aesthetic. Who knows though, the spaceplane plus parts looks pretty clean...

Check the release thread, there's plenty of visuals there (I agree, Squad's picture only really shows the engine).

And yes, perhaps aside from Mk1 fuel tanks and structural parts (I like the stock ones better), this should be stock. The only reason I'm not using it is that it messes SXT up (which I use extensively), and SXT would have to adapt if Squad adapted this mod.

Check the release thread, there's plenty of visuals there (I agree, Squad's picture only really shows the engine).

And yes, perhaps aside from Mk1 fuel tanks and structural parts (I like the stock ones better), this should be stock. The only reason I'm not using it is that it messes SXT up (which I use extensively), and SXT would have to adapt if Squad adapted this mod.
Beautiful reworks of the stock parts, and the best part is that the models have the same proportions as the originals so they won't break existing designs. Great work!
This mod is one of my favorites, and I would be very happy to see it implemented into stock.
I looked at this one not too long ago. It has some really beautiful work in it. I'm impressed at how well the parts retain the unique flavor of the originals, even when they're complete redesigns.
Fantastic mod and I wholeheartedly agree with this! Congratulations!
I downloaded last night. The parts looks better now especially the engines. But I would like this mod only change the look of the parts but not their behaviors so I don't need to redesign some craft.

But I would like this mod only change the look of the parts but not their behaviors so I don't need to redesign some craft.

Agreed here.

But I would like this mod only change the look of the parts but not their behaviors so I don't need to redesign some craft.
Agreed here.

I must have missed something - what behaviours are changed? The only one I can think of is engine gimbal response speed and the 1-2 pod hatch.. I don't see how any other changes (like the docking ports) would require a craft redesign..
